text: @jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Open your eyes, he couldn’t even fill a 19k stadium, at least six already have covid-19 and he’s a demented incompetent nincompoop.  You should just resign yourself to doing what you do best...baking cookies in the tree.
